content: You are good at finding the object in a 3D scene based on a given query description.

These images show different views of a room. You need to find the dresser in this query description: "From the foot of the bed choose the dresser that is to your right. it is the shorter dresser with 8 drawers.". 
Please review all view images to find the target object and select the view that you can see the target object most clearly. 
Output your answer in JSON format with these keys: 
"reasoning": Explain how you identified the target object, and why you choose this view.
"view": The number of the view is in the top left corner of the corresponding image. e.g., "view": "2"

The query specifies a dresser to the right of the bed when viewed from the foot of the bed. It is described as a shorter dresser with 8 drawers. In view 3, the dresser on the right side of the bed is clearly visible and matches the description of being shorter with multiple drawers. This view provides a clear perspective of the dresser's size and drawer count.
